welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cranston! Get ready to explore the charm of our city, known for its historic landmarks, beautiful parks, and vibrant local culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that Cranston has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights and contains a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Interlink Terminal
terminals.description: The Interlink Terminal at T. F. Green Airport is a modern transportation hub, connecting the airport to the MBTA commuter rail and rental car facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at State Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
